root.text: Hmph. You look fresh. The Adventure Society doesn't baby newcomers. Keep your weapon sharp and your wits sharper. What do you want?

choices.text: Tell me about the Adventure Society.

about_rufus.text: Name's Rufus. I've been clearing dungeons and hunting beasts since before you were born. Got this scar from a Shadow Stalker in the Deep Caverns. Nasty piece of work, but I mounted its head on the guild wall.

about_stalker.text: A nasty predator that blends into the darkness. If you ever see the shadows move when there's no light source... run. Or pray you have a Light Essence handy.

about_faction.text: We're the backbone of civilization. We handle the threats the city guards can't. Monsters, rogue awakener, confluences gone wrong. It's dangerous work, but the pay is good and the glory is better.

join_info.text: Prove your worth. Bring us trophies, complete contracts. Don't die. Simple as that.

advice.text: Don't rely on just one Attribute. A warrior with no Spirit falls to the first mind trick. A mage with no Recovery dies from a stiff breeze. Balance, kid. And always carry potions.

root.text: Hmm? Oh, pardon me! I was just calculating the etheric resonance of this location. It's quite fascinating, isn't it? The way the ley lines intersect here...

choices.text: Can you teach me about Magic?

research.text: I'm attempting to map the fluctuations in the ambient mana field. I believe that recent monster aggressions are linked to a subtle shift in the planetary alignment relative to the Void Plane.

simple_research.text: In layman's terms: Bad stars make monsters angry. I'm trying to predict where they'll get angry next.

research_findings.text: Preliminary data suggests a localized spike in the Northern Wastes. I wouldn't go there without significant protection against Cold and Void damage.

lore_magic.text: Everything is vibration. Essence is just the frequency at which reality vibrates. By attuning our souls—our Spirit attribute—we can manipulate those frequencies. Fire, Ice, Time... all just notes in the cosmic symphony.

choices.text: How do I increase my Spirit?

training_info.text: Meditation is key. Also, exposure to raw mana sources, though that can be dangerous. Awakening Stones help focus the mind, but true power comes from understanding the Essence you bond with.

root.text: Halt. State your business with the Order of the Shield. We are currently on high alert.

choices.text: I'm an adventurer looking to help.

adventurer_path.text: Adventurers... wild cards. But useful. If you wish to aid the Order, keep the roads safe. We are stretched thin protecting the outer settlements.

confidence.text: Confidence is good. Arrogance is fatal. Remember that.

threats.text: Bandits, mostly. But we've had reports of a corrupted beast near the old ruins. If you see it, do not engage alone.

protection_path.text: The Order protects all citizens. If you are in danger, stay within the city walls. The guards are posted at every gate.

flavor.text: It is standard issue Plate of the Sanctum. Forged with Iron and Light essence. It is not for show.

heavy.text: The weight is a reminder of our burden. We bear it so others do not have to.

root.text: Don't touch anything. I'm measuring the background mana flux. Wait... you're not from the Authority.

about_cassian.text: Cassian Thorne, Silver-Rank System Auditor. I handle the problems the city pretends don't exist. Mostly, I try to keep the laws of physics from snapping like a cheap rubber band.

about_crime.text: Commodore Elara. Gold Rank. Dead in a sealed room. No wounds, no mana drain. Just... ceased. And the only clue is a wrinkle in the floor. A wrinkle in diamond-hard glass.

root.text: I... I just ring the bell! That's all I do! The Authority gave me the schedule!

calm_down.text: I can't! The thrum... it skipped a beat. I heard it! The Welcome Song... it wasn't a warning!

schedule.text: They told me to hit the frequency for Ascension. To open the door. I didn't know she was fighting it! I didn't know!
